title: FFWD RYOT 77 adds another, deeper & more aero carbon wheelset for TT & triathlon
content:
Extending their boxy aerodynamic LAW Tech rims once more, FFWD go deeper RYOT77 aero carbon disc brake wheels aimed at time trial and triathlon racing. With a new 77mm deep, wide 21mm internal, full carbon tubeless RYOT rim, FFWD promises more speed and versatility for tri, TT, and even fast flat road racing, plus a coming […]

The post FFWD RYOT 77 adds another, deeper & more aero carbon wheelset for TT & triathlon appeared first on Bikerumor.
author: Cory Benson
